aliases.description: Other locations where this guide can be found. Should be an array of entries in the form /applications/big-data/using-big-data/

author.description: First and last names of the original guide author.

h1_title.description: This sets the H1, but leaves the title in the metadata

comments.description: If false, Disqus comments will be disabled for this guide.

contributor.description: For freelancer guides only. First and last name of the freelancer who wrote the guide.

deprecated.description: If true, guide will be displayed with a deprecated tag on view and in search results. Will not be visible on main section pages but still appears on subsections.

description.description: Two to three sentences describing the guide.

expiryDate.description: If the date is before the current date, Hugo will not build this guide.

external_resources.description: List of external links that will appear at the bottom of the guide.

icon.description: For items displayed on frontpage, this specifies the icon that will identify this guide.

keywords.description: Comma-separated array of search keywords relevant to this guide.

layout.description: If a layout other than the default is needed (i.e. for the Contribute page), specify the name of the layout here.

license.description: The license under which this guide is published. Should be a Markdown link to the relevant license documentation.

modified.description: The date this guide was last modified. Should use the form YYYY-MM-DD.

modified_by.description: Name of the writer who last modified this guide.

og_description.description: Description to be displayed on Facebook links.

og_title.description: Title to be displayed on Facebook links.

os.description: List of operating systems to generate buttons

promo.description: Set to false to disable DOCS10 promo code message

published.description: Date this guide was originally published. Should use the form YYYY-MM-DD.

shortguide.description: If true, this guide will be hidden from all layouts and search index.

show_on_frontpage.description: If true, this guide will be displayed on the landing page at linode.com/docs/.

show_on_rss_feed.description: If false, publishing or updates to this guide will not be shown in the RSS feed.

slug.description: Hugo front matter variable. Specifies the tail of the output URL for this page.

title_short.description: Short version of title to be displayed in a front page icon.

weight.description: For guides displayed on the front (landing) page. Setting a higher weight will move the guide to the top of the list of icons.
